function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contamination of indoor air with formaldehyde and toluene","Impact":"Health risks to building occupants, including respiratory issues and other health problems","Mitigation":"Implement a filtration system to remove formaldehyde and toluene from the indoor air","Technologies":"Use botanical filters for air cleaning","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management or owners"},{"Description":"Introduction of additional humidity by the air filtration system","Impact":"Increased moisture levels leading to discomfort and potential mold growth","Mitigation":"Enhance HVAC systems to remove or balance the additional humidity","Technologies":"HVAC systems with dehumidification capabilities","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management or owners"},{"Description":"Overserving of air filtration for a smaller space","Impact":"Inefficient use of air filtration resources and increased energy consumption","Mitigation":"Implement a filtration system that matches the size of the building space","Technologies":"Properly sized air filtration systems","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management or owners"}]}
